title: What is your favorite Tamil melody songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ennai kaanavillaye netrodu from kaadhal desam.Malai kaatru vandhu tamil pesudhe from vedam.Oru poyyavadhu sol kanne from jodi.Velli malare from jodi.Kaadhal kaditham theetave from jodi.Potha villaye potha villaye from mudinja ivana pudi.dhil dhil dhil manadhil from mella thirandhadhu kadhavu.mannile mannile vandhu udaiyudu vaanam from mazhai.Chandhiranai thottadhu yar from ratchagan.o priya priya from idhayathai thirudadhe.All songs from priyamanavale.Thodu thodu nilave from thulladha manamum thullum.Enna vilai azhage from kaadhalar dhinam.Lesa Lesa nee illamal vaazhvadhu lesa from LesaLesa.

1.Nee Katru Naan Maram (Nilave Vaa) 2.Ayyaiyo Nenju Alaiuthadi (Aadukalam) 3.Nenje nenje nee enge (Ayan) 4.En kadhal Solla neram illai (Paiya) 5.Azhahe Azhahe (Oru kal Oru Kannadi) 6.Ennavale Adi Ennavale (Kaadhalan) 7.Po Nee Po (3) 8.Yenna Solla Yethu Solla (Manam Kothi Paravai) 9.Vizhiye Vizhiye (Ithu Kathirvelan Kaadhal) 10.Jal Jal Jal Osai (Manam Kothi Paravai)
